tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 3; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: is not the constant Way,

sense.def: invariant>determinate, well-defined; true

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 3; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Having no name, it (Tao) is the beginning (origin) of Heaven and Earth,

sense.def: beginning, the initial state as a dynamic state motivating what happens after that beginning; proper beginning; original cause, Greek: archē;

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 3; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: having a name it is the mother of the myriad things.

sense.def: that from which something originates

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 3; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: if you constantly have desires, you can only see its (limit:) outer fringes.

sense.def: desires; preferences; impulse

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 3; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: These two (sc. origin and mother) come from the same [source] but they are called by different names (terms).

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 3; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: These two (sc. origin and mother) come from the same [source] but they are called by different names (terms).

sense.def: after number phrase 三家者， 之數物者

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 3; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the most sombre of all mysteries,

sense.def: even more

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 3; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the (gate:) source of all mysteries.

sense.def: mystery; secret; secrt crucial point

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 3; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the (gate:) source of all mysteries.

sense.def: "gate"

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 2.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 5; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: and so [they know] the ugly;

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 2.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 5; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: and so [they know] the bad.

sense.def: then under such circumstances; then indeed, then in point of fact; then as an important (often final) result; sometimes hybrid: then this

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 2.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 5; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore to exist and not exist create each other,

sense.def: absence; the place where something is absent or lacking

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven and Earth are not benevolent,

sense.def: the deities of Heaven and Earth

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven and Earth are not benevolent,

sense.def: show moral generous concern

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven and Earth are not benevolent,

sense.def: to act with accordance to Goodness; have Good behaviour

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they treat the myriad things like straw dogs.

sense.def: made of straw; fed with fodder

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they treat the myriad things like straw dogs.

sense.def: originally: puppy, also the young of bears and tigers; mostely generally: dog

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they treat the myriad things like straw dogs.

sense.def: treat N1 as N2

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The Sages are not benevolent,

sense.def: show moral generous concern

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The Sages are not benevolent,

sense.def: to act with accordance to Goodness; have Good behaviour

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they treat the people like straw dogs.

sense.def: made of straw; fed with fodder

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they treat the people like straw dogs.

sense.def: originally: puppy, also the young of bears and tigers; mostely generally: dog

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they treat the people like straw dogs.

sense.def: treat N1 as N2

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The space between Heaven and Earth

sense.def: the space between

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: is it not like a bellow or a flute,

sense.def: copula-like verb: be like; be no better than

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: is it not like a bellow or a flute,

sense.def: bellows

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they are empty but are not exhausted, (LC 859)

sense.def: be literally empty (like storehouses etc)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: set them in action and even more comes out.

sense.def: move, shake (as the earth etc)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Voluble search will often be exhausted (LC 1580);

sense.def: in large numbers, one a wide scale; in large quantities on a large scale; referring to the object: many objects; most subjects

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Voluble search will often be exhausted (LC 1580);

sense.def: numerous times, frequently; on several occasions; at frequent intervals

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Voluble search will often be exhausted (LC 1580);

sense.def: run into real trouble, get into a tight corner

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 5.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Voluble search will often be exhausted (LC 1580);

sense.def: be out of one's depth; be at one's wit's end; be completely lost for words; not know what to think or say

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 6.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 9 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The nourishing Spirit (sc. Tao) does not die.

sense.def: be immortal (not: not die)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 7.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: is that they do not live for themselves.

sense.def: give birth to (oneself)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 8.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The greatest goodness is that of water.

sense.def: of higher quality, of superior quality; best

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 8.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The greatest goodness is that of water.

sense.def: moral excellence in action; acts of goodness

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 8.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The greatest goodness is that of water.

sense.def: excellence, special strong features (always stable or permanent features)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 8.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The goodness of water is that it benefits the myriad things

sense.def: excellence, special strong features (always stable or permanent features)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 8.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: it dwells in the place which all people detest (sc. the lowest).

sense.def: be in (a place), stay in (a place); stay among (the barbarians etc); choose to dwell in, choose as one's abode; take up private residence in

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 8.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: it dwells in the place which all people detest (sc. the lowest).

sense.def: intellectually ordinary people (who may be of considerable social status); the hoi polloi; a vulgar uneducated person (not necessarily plural!)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 8.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore it stands near to Tao (the Way).

sense.def: come close to (e.g. the truth, a virtue, one's aim), approximate 幾於死亡 We are close to death.

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 8.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: for action prefer ability,

sense.def: public service; public tasks

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 8.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: for action prefer ability,

sense.def: (especially official) matter, especially: public task, official business; public event; public project, (military) undertaking, task; one's professional concern 五事

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 8.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: for action prefer ability,

sense.def: capability; physical capability, concrete technical capability; potential, capacity 人各有能

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 8.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: for starting some work one should prefer seasonableness (the right time);

sense.def: the taking of intiatives; activation; the initiating of an action

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 8.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 11 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: for starting some work one should prefer seasonableness (the right time);

sense.def: timeliness; being in time; the right time; the appropriate season

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: If you test [a weapon] and sharpen it

sense.def: cause to be sharp> sharpen

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: you cannot for long preserve [its sharpness], cf. LC 215;

sense.def: for a long time, for any length of time; forever; in the long run

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: you cannot for long preserve [its sharpness], cf. LC 215;

sense.def: be kept safe and secure

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: when bronze and jade fill the hall

sense.def: gold =黃金

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: when bronze and jade fill the hall

sense.def: jade

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: when bronze and jade fill the hall

sense.def: fill out; fill out everywhere 滿於

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: nobody can preserve it;

sense.def: keep to and ensure that one does not lose; hold in reserve

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: having wealth and honour and then being proud,

sense.def: (of a clan etc) be wealthy

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: having wealth and honour and then being proud,

sense.def: be noble; enjoy high status; hold a high position 最為貴,最貴,至貴

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: having wealth and honour and then being proud,

sense.def: be arrogant in behaviour, be overconfident

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: oneself brings disaster on oneself, see LC 2050

sense.def: send (oneself) N2, bring upon (oneself) N2

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: oneself brings disaster on oneself, see LC 2050

sense.def: (deserved) bad fortune; (deserved) disaster; (deserved) calamity

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: When the work is achieved to withdraw (the person:) oneself,

sense.def: be achieved; be accomplished 可遂

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: When the work is achieved to withdraw (the person:) oneself,

sense.def: contrastive: himself; oneself; the person him/herself (also: 身雖無能)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: When the work is achieved to withdraw (the person:) oneself,

sense.def: in person, himself

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 9.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: When the work is achieved to withdraw (the person:) oneself,

sense.def: move backward, (typically decide to) withdraw (usually to the point where one came from); leave, leave the room; withdraw from court; imp: out of my sight!

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 10.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Achieve that your (creative:) spiritual soul and your animal soul

sense.def: perplexed, confused

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 10.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Concentrating on the (vital) breath, making it soft

sense.def: cause to be (properly) concentrated

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 10.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: you can become like a baby.

sense.def: live up to (standards); be a match for; act on the model on

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 10.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: you can become like a baby.

sense.def: small (still breast-feeding) baby; child (of playing age)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 10.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: can you be without flaw.

sense.def: fulfill the function of (occasionally also: pretend to be), impersonate,

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 10.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: can you be without flaw.

sense.def: feminity; female role

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 10.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: When your intelligence reaches in all four directions,

sense.def: state of intellectual understanding

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 10.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: When your intelligence reaches in all four directions,

sense.def: in all intellectual/cognitive directions

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 10.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: When your intelligence reaches in all four directions,

sense.def: have an accomplished understanding of things

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 10.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 13 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: can you be without action.

sense.def: knowing something; knowing things; knowledge of things; discursive knowledge, conceptual knowledge

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 11.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 15; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: but on the [spaces] where there is nothing

sense.def: absence; the place where something is absent or lacking

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Favour and disgrace are like something frightening;

sense.def: favourite status, favour; favourable treatment 有寵於

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Favour and disgrace are like something frightening;

sense.def: as it were, German: gleichsam; Danish: ligesom; it is as if

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: high rank and great calamity are like the body (i.e. transient).

sense.def: hold in high esteem; set great store by, prize highly; regard as very important

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: high rank and great calamity are like the body (i.e. transient).

sense.def: large-scale, great; overall (not partial or small-minded); fundamental; of a higher order

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: high rank and great calamity are like the body (i.e. transient).

sense.def: serious trouble, misfortune; resulting trouble (from one's actions) 三患"three kinds of disaster"

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: high rank and great calamity are like the body (i.e. transient).

sense.def: like

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: high rank and great calamity are like the body (i.e. transient).

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Favour descends (comes down upon you),

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Favour descends (comes down upon you),

sense.def: as it were, German: gleichsam; Danish: ligesom; it is as if

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: if you get it it is like frightening.

sense.def: lose control of; lose the allegiance of (the people etc); come to lose what one used to abstractly have (like knowledge, control etc)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: if you get it it is like frightening.

sense.def: as it were, German: gleichsam; Danish: ligesom; it is as if

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

sense.def: as it were, German: gleichsam; Danish: ligesom; it is as if

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The reason why we have great calamities

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: is because we have a body (person).

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: is because we have a body (person).

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: When (it comes to) that we have no body,

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975
