sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 13.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; tr. CH; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the one who in his loving holds his body as the equal of the realm

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 14.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: These three we cannot examine,

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 14.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: These three we cannot examine,

sense.def: after number phrase 三家者， 之數物者

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 14.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: These three we cannot examine,

sense.def: be investigated into

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 14.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: therefore we blend them into a unity.

sense.def: be chaotic

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 14.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Its upper part is not bright,

sense.def: be (figuratively) glittering, all shiny and bright (of music)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 14.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: this is called the confused;

sense.def: be in a confused psychological state; of a person: bewildered

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 14.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 19; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: this is called the confused;

sense.def: be confused, indistinct

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: who in the mysteries were penetrating, deep, so that one cannot understand them.

sense.def: go deep; be profound

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: who in the mysteries were penetrating, deep, so that one cannot understand them.

sense.def: be generally recognised for what one is; be got an idea of

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: They were hesitant like those who in winter wade through a stream (see LC 2165, 2167),

sense.def: in a wintery manner, in the manner appropriate to winter; in the winter

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: They were hesitant like those who in winter wade through a stream (see LC 2165, 2167),

sense.def: cross (a river); traverse (water)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they were deliberate like those who fear all their neighbours;

sense.def: be hestiating (as if suspicious)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they were deliberate like those who fear all their neighbours;

sense.def: stand in fear of; fear, be very much afraid of and at the same time in awe of

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they were deliberate like those who fear all their neighbours;

sense.def: all the neighbours

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they were dignified like a guest,

sense.def: be unpardoning, harsh and stern; maintain strict discipline

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they were relaxed (soft) like ice that is melting,

sense.def: be falling apart; be scattered; dispersed

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they were empty like a valley,

sense.def: be vast and empty

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: who can when it is muddy by keeping still gradually make it clear;

sense.def: who? (non-contrastive, i. e. not: "which of these listed possible subjects") but typically: what kind of person

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: who can when it is muddy by keeping still gradually make it clear;

sense.def: be (musically or morally) impure or defiled; be (metaphysically) muddied (i.e. soiled by contact with the world)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: who can find repose, by continual (work:) effort for it, it will gradually be created.

sense.def: who? (non-contrastive, i. e. not: "which of these listed possible subjects") but typically: what kind of person

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: who can find repose, by continual (work:) effort for it, it will gradually be created.

sense.def: slowly, softly, gently; with slow emphasis; at one's own pace, gradually

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Desires not to be full.

sense.def: should (in one's own interest) 不欲 "should not"

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 15.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 21; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: That he can be worn and yet newly made.]]

sense.def: newly, recently; lately; just

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 17.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 25; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the people all say: we are like that by nature.

sense.def: be so of and by itself; be naturally oneself; be natural; come naturally

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 18.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 27; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: when the state was darkened and in disorder,

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 19.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 27; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: then thieves and malefactors will disappear.

sense.def: bandits

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 19.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 27; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: With these three abolishments

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 19.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 27; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: With these three abolishments

sense.def: after number phrase 三家者， 之數物者

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 20.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 29; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Discard (study:)learning[sc. with its many futile disquisitions] and there will be no worry.

sense.def: discontinue the use of what one has or what prevails

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 20.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 29; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Most men are (bright:) looking happy

sense.def: bright> be merry; be delighted; gay

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 20.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 29; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: like a baby who has not yet smiled.

sense.def: relative clause marker equivalent to 而

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 20.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 29; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: like a baby who has not yet smiled.

sense.def: smile as a baby (LAO)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 20.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 29; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Most men have affluence

sense.def: intellectually ordinary people (who may be of considerable social status); the hoi polloi; a vulgar uneducated person (not necessarily plural!)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 20.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 29; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The vulgar men are bright,

sense.def: understand clearly

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 20.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 29; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: calm as the sea,

sense.def: be limpid, tranquil and serene; be unperturbed; be placid (like the sea)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 20.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 29; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: All men have their use (LC 20093),

sense.def: intellectually ordinary people (who may be of considerable social status); the hoi polloi; a vulgar uneducated person (not necessarily plural!)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 21.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 31; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: comes from the Tao.

sense.def: this aforementioned N; the preceding N (is the one the SUBJECT VERBS) 敗是求 "it is defeat that you have sought"

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 21.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 31; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The Tao is such a phenomenon

sense.def: intrinsic essential nature 《文選·陸機〈文賦〉》："其為物也多姿，其為體也屢遷。"

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 21.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 31; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: their essence is very real,

sense.def: be genuine, be unfaked 甚真

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 22.1 tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 33 ; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: if you are worn you will be [as] new.

sense.def: be new (to the job etc.)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 22.2 tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 33; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: he does not show himself, therefore he becomes (bright) illustrious,

sense.def: make a display of (oneself)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 22.2 tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 33; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: he does not approve of himself, therefore he becomes famous,

sense.def: consider (oneself) as right, consider one's own opinions as true

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 22.2 tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 33; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: he does not boast of himself, therefore he has achievements,

sense.def: boast about (oneself)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 22.2 tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 33; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: he is not boastful, therefore he becomes a leader,

sense.def: boast about (oneself)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 22.2 tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 33; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: how can it be empty words.

sense.def: empty speeches, unsubstantiated claim; idle propositions; idle statement; unfounded statement; lies

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 23.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 35; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: is to accord with nature.

sense.def: conduct according to nature

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 23.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 35; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: A spell off violent wind does not last for a whole morning,

sense.def: whirlwind [[Note incidentally that this binome is not normally used adverbially. Binomes of this sort are frequent. See however ZHUANG 2 who deviates from this rule.]]

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 23.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 35; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: When Heaven and Earth cannot make it long-lasting,

sense.def: even (an N)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 24.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The one who stands on tiptoes, does not stand firm,

sense.def: CC: stand on tip-toe in order to see far; LAO 24: stand on tip-top

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 24.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the one who strides, does not march,

sense.def: stride across (the high threshold etc)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 24.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the one who strides, does not march,

sense.def: walk, take a walk; travel; be on the move; go on a tour of inspection; walk along

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 24.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the one who shows himself does not become illustrious,

sense.def: make a display of (oneself)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 24.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the one who approves of himself, will not become famous,

sense.def: consider (oneself) as right, consider one's own opinions as true

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 24.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the one who approves of himself, will not become famous,

sense.def: become strikingly visible, become obvious

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 24.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the one who boasts of himself, he will have no achievements,

sense.def: boast about (oneself)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 24.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the one who is boastful, does not become a leader,

sense.def: boast about (oneself)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 25.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: There was a something achieved in chaos,

sense.def: chaoticly; confusedly

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 25.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: how quiet, how empty,

sense.def: be free from sound, be quiet, be serene

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 25.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: how quiet, how empty,

sense.def: void; empty; deserted

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 25.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: standing alone without changing.

sense.def: change

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 25.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: It goes all round and it is never endangered,

sense.def: in circles; circulating

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 25.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: it can have been the mother of the world.

sense.def: occasionally metaphorical: source and origin

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 25.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: I do not know its [proper] name.

sense.def: name (of a person or thing)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 25.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: As an appellation I name it Tao the Way.

sense.def: give an adult name; generally: find a name for something which exists

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 25.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Earth is ruled by Heaven,

sense.def: model oneself after; emulate, take as a model, follow as a method; (See also IMITATE)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 25.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven is ruled by Tao,

sense.def: model oneself after; emulate, take as a model, follow as a method; (See also IMITATE)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 25.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 37; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Tao is ruled by its own character.

sense.def: model oneself after; emulate, take as a model, follow as a method; (See also IMITATE)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 26.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 39; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: therefore the Sage may travel a whole day,

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 27.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 41; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The skilful speaker has no flaws that are impeached,

sense.def: flaw (in a person); blemish (in a person or action)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 27.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 41; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The skilful speaker has no flaws that are impeached,

sense.def: defect, mistake

tls:text.tls:srcline: 善閉者無關楗而不可啟，

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 27.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 41; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the skilful closer uses no bars or locks,yet [the door] cannot be opened,

sense.def: LAO: bolt, made of wood

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 27.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 41; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the skilful man is the (master:) teacher of the unskilful man,

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 27.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 41; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the skilful man is the (master:) teacher of the unskilful man,

sense.def: inferior, bad 不善人，不善之性

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 27.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 41; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the unskilful man is the (material on which to work:) helper of the skilful man.

sense.def: inferior, bad 不善人，不善之性

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 27.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 41; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the unskilful man is the (material on which to work:) helper of the skilful man.

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 28.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 41; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The one who (knows:) realises his manhood (strength)

sense.def: maleness

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 28.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 41; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: and yet retains his femininity (softness),

sense.def: feminity; female role

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 28.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 41; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: his constant virtue will be sufficient,

sense.def: invariant; constant; permanent, enduring, ever-lasting

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 28.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 41; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: When the Sage uses it (sc. the unworked wood) he will be the leader of all officials.

sense.def: head of an administrative office> senior official

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 29.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the one who intends and wishes to capture the realm, and [tries to] do it,

sense.def: have a general desire to; be about to

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 29.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: For, the creatures, some go forward, some follow after,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 29.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: some breathe gently, some blow heavily,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 29.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: some breathe gently, some blow heavily,

sense.def: exhale; sigh; blow through the nose; sob; breathe out gently

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 29.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: some breathe gently, some blow heavily,

sense.def: blow

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 29.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: some are strong, some are weak,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 29.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: some break, some destroy.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 29.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: some break, some destroy.

sense.def: to be destructive

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 29.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: some break, some destroy.

sense.def: collapse, tumble down; be ruined (also of abstract things)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 29.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Sage declines excessiveness (LC 1484),

sense.def: excess; exaggeration; overindulgence 去甚 "get rid of excessiveness"

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 29.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: he declines extravagance,

sense.def: outrageous extravagance in the use of wealth; luxuriousness

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 29.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: he declines grandness.

sense.def: arrogance; arrogant begaviour

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 30.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: where armies have camped,

sense.def: the army of the contextually determinate N; army; OBI: military camp, encampment. Troops, armed force, division of the armed forces, regular armed forces; (obsolescent after Qin) HF 1.2: (several hundred thousand) organised armed personnel (should probably be npost-N)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 30.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: when things have become strong: reached their maturity, they grow old.

sense.def: be in strong basic shape, be going strong; be stout, be robust, be able-bodied, be in one's prime; be constitutionally strong; be fit and strong enough to work; thrive particularly

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 30.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 45; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: what is contrary to the Tao will soon come to an end.

sense.def: prematurely, too early; so early

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 31.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 47; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Beautiful weapons are ill-omened instruments.

sense.def: armour and weapons; military equipment (not nececessarily only armour and weapons specifically, compare 仁義 "morality")

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 31.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 47; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Beautiful weapons are ill-omened instruments.

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 31.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 47; here tr. Karlgren 1975

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 31.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 47; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Since weapons are ill-omened instruments

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 31.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 47; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they are not a noble man's instruments.

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 31.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 47; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Calm and stillness he prizes.

sense.def: tranquility; spiritual ease; detachment

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 31.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 47; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: on occasions of mourning precedence is given to the right.

sense.def: pertaining to mourning 凶服，凶事"case of death"

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 32.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 49; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the myriad creatures would by themselves come to them as their guests (sc. submit to them).

sense.def: submit to become a respected subject

tls:text.tls:srcline:
民莫之令而自均焉。
始制有名，

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 32.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 49; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Among men there is nobody who commands this, but by itself it becomes evenly distributed when it (the Tao) first gives directions, there are names (terms for notions).

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
民莫之令而自均焉。
始制有名，

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 32.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 49; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Among men there is nobody who commands this, but by itself it becomes evenly distributed when it (the Tao) first gives directions, there are names (terms for notions).

sense.def: be on a par; be equal; be equable

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 33.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 51; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: he who knows himself is enlightened.

sense.def: understand (oneself); know where one is;

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 34.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 51; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The great Way (Tao) is overflowing,

sense.def: broad

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 34.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 51; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: and it does not pretend to be their lord.

sense.def: leader (should perhaps be n(post-N))

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 35.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 53; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they are in peace and safety and become grand.

sense.def: LAO gloss: be peaceful

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 35.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 53; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Music and dainty dishes of food,

sense.def: cakes, delicacies[can also contain meat; in LIJI described as dumplings made by mixing beed, mutton and pork with rice][CA]

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 35.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 53; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: how insipid is its taste,

sense.def: be bland, be insipid

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 36.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 53; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: If you want to contract [something]

sense.def: have a general desire to; be about to

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 36.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 53; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: if you want to weaken [something]

sense.def: have a general desire to; be about to

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 36.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 53; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: if you want to overthrow [something],

sense.def: have a general desire to; be about to

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 36.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 53; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: if you want to snatch [thing],

sense.def: have a general desire to; be about to

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 36.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 53; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: a state's sharp instruments (weapons) should not be shown to the people.

sense.def: should

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 37.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 55; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: then I would restrain them

sense.def: restrain and control

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 37.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 55; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: and all the world will by itself become (settled:) restful.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 38.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 57; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The rites (decorum)

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 38.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 57; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: fore-knowledge [may seem to be]

sense.def: intelligent perception or awareness of things

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 38.4; tr. D.C. Lau 1982: 57; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Hence a great man

sense.def: adult male

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 39.1; tr. D.C. Lau 1982: 59; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the Spirits have reached the Unity and thereby are divine,

sense.def: magical effectiveness, supernatural efficiency; divine influence; divinely aided succour

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 39.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 59; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: highness has lowness as fundament.

sense.def: basis, foundations (of the state etc)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 39.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 59; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: call themselves "orphans, single ones, the not good".

sense.def: call (oneself) N2

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 40.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 61; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The returning [to an original state] is Tao's only movement.

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 40.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 61; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Weakness is Tao's application.

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 41.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 61; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they laugh greatly at it.

sense.def: in a big way; very much, mightily, highly, greatly; on a large scale

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 42.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 63; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The Tao produced the One,

sense.def: the One; unity; inner unity; oneness and total concentration 得一 "attain to oneness"

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 42.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 63; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: One produced the Two,

sense.def: the One; unity; inner unity; oneness and total concentration 得一 "attain to oneness"

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 43.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 65; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: rushes against the hardest thing in the world.

sense.def: gallop over; gallop through; ride roughshed over

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 44.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 65; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: which is the most (beloved:) precious;

sense.def: be dear to the heart, be emotionally close; be intimate 太親

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 44.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 65; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: body (life) and valuables,

sense.def: goods, commodities; luxury goods, luxury items; especially: items made of metal or jade

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 44.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 65; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore he who loves greatly (is greedy)

sense.def: for this objective reason: therefore

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 44.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 65; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: will certainly have great expenses,

sense.def: expenditure; cost; expense; lavish use of resources

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 45.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: What is greatly perfected may seem defective,

sense.def: 大巧若拙 be as if Ving

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 45.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: What is greatly perfected may seem defective,

sense.def: be deficient; be defective; have shortcomings

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 45.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: what is greatly full may seem empty,

sense.def: as it were, German: gleichsam; Danish: ligesom; it is as if

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 45.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: what is greatly full may seem empty,

sense.def: 大巧若拙 be as if Ving

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 45.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: what is greatly full may seem empty,

sense.def: be empty

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 45.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: what is greatly straight may seem crooked;

sense.def: as it were, German: gleichsam; Danish: ligesom; it is as if

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 45.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: what is greatly straight may seem crooked;

sense.def: 大巧若拙 be as if Ving

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 45.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: who is greatly skilful may seem incapable;

sense.def: as it were, German: gleichsam; Danish: ligesom; it is as if

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 45.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: who is greatly skilful may seem incapable;

sense.def: 大巧若拙 be as if Ving

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 45.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: who is greatly eloquent may seem slow of speech:

sense.def: as it were, German: gleichsam; Danish: ligesom; it is as if

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 46.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they relegate the fleet-footed horses with a view to the dung (sc. to be transported to the fields).

sense.def: fleet-footed (horses), racing (horses)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 46.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: they relegate the fleet-footed horses with a view to the dung (sc. to be transported to the fields).

sense.def: fertilise the fields

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 46.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the horses for war chariots live and breed in the suburbs [of the cities].

sense.def: military, belonging to the armed forces

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 46.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: no sin is greater than to (sanction:) give free reins to one's desires (LC 755).

sense.def: fault, moral responsibility for an unfortunate state of affairs

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 46.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 67; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: no sin is greater than to (sanction:) give free reins to one's desires (LC 755).

sense.def: (deserved) bad fortune; (deserved) disaster; (deserved) calamity

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 48.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 69; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: till he comes to Non acting,

sense.def: non-action; refusal to take unnatural initiatives

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 48.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 69; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: If he comes to having action,

sense.def: when 及其。。。

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 49.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 71; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The Sage has no constant (heart:) mind,

sense.def: invariant; constant; permanent, enduring, ever-lasting

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 52.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 75; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: and to the end of your life you will not be endangered.

sense.def: life-time; personal survival; one's life as an individual (as someting one might lose, or which might be endangered)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 52.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 75; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: To see what is small is called to be clear-sighted;

sense.def: what is small, something small; specifically refers to: small state

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 52.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 75; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Us its (the Tao's) brightness

sense.def: light; brightness; glint

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 53.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 77; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: I would only fear paths leading astray.

sense.def: this aforementioned N; the preceding N (is the one the SUBJECT VERBS) 敗是求 "it is defeat that you have sought"

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 53.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 77; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the fields are weed-covered.

sense.def: not bear fruit, be overgrown only with weeds MENG 荒蕪

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 53.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 77; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the granaries are very empty,

sense.def: general: oblong granary for all kinds of grain or other food supplies

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 53.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 77; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: in the belts they carry sharp swords,

sense.def: sword

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 54.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 77; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Cultivate it in your person,

sense.def: contrastive: one's own person; oneself; himself

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 54.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 77; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the virtue will be (true:) real,

sense.def: your; your own

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 54.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 77; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the virtue will be (true:) real,

sense.def: be genuine, be unfaked 甚真

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 54.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 77; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the virtue will be universal.

sense.def: be far-reaching, spread widely

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 54.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 77; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Hence by aid of your person you should (observe:) judge [other] persons,

sense.def: contrastive: one's own person; oneself; himself

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 55.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 79; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The one who amply possesses the virtue [of the Tao]

sense.def: hence: harbour inside one (any kinds of feelings or sentiments) [See also CONTAIN][CA]

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 55.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 79; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: can be compared to a babe.

sense.def: little baby

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 55.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 79; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Stinging insects and snakes do not sting him,

sense.def: poisoned; poisonous; poison-bearing 毒蛇

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 55.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 79; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Stinging insects and snakes do not sting him,

sense.def: bite the contextually determinate object

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 55.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 79; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: His bones are weak,his sinews soft,l but he grasps firmly.

sense.def: be weak, frail; be young and weak

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 55.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 79; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: His bones are weak,his sinews soft,l but he grasps firmly.

sense.def: soft (particularly on the surface???)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 55.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 79; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: He does not yet know about the union of female and male,

sense.def: the female (horse; cow; victim, etc.)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 55.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 79; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: He does not yet know about the union of female and male,

sense.def: male living creatures; male of birds or beasts

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 55.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 79; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: He does not yet know about the union of female and male,

sense.def: sexual union

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 55.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 79; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: He can cry for a whole day, but does not become hoarse.

sense.def: shout at the top of one's voice to make known one's feelings [also: howl][CA]

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 55.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 79; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: He can cry for a whole day, but does not become hoarse.

sense.def: become hoarse; loose one's voice

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 55.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 79; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: what is contrary to Tao soon (ceases:) dies.

sense.def: prematurely, too early; so early

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 56.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2:81; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: he breaks his sharp point,

sense.def: round off and make smooth; blunt (the sharpness of a blade)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 56.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2:81; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: he breaks his sharp point,

sense.def: sharp edge, sharpness

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 56.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2:81; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: he attempers his brightness,

sense.def: light; brightness; glint

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 57.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 83; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: by stratagems one (uses weapons:) carries on war,

sense.def: crafty tricks, indirect stratagems

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 57.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 83; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the more darkened the state will be.

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 57.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 83; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the more talent and skilful there are,

sense.def: entertaining trick, attractive skill [also general: skill in any field][CA]

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 57.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 83; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the more thieves and malefactors there will be.

sense.def: bandits

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 57.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 83; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the more thieves and malefactors there will be.

sense.def: be many in number

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 57.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 83; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the people will be transformed of themselves.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 57.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 83; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the people will be corrected by themselves,

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 57.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 83; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the people will be enriched by themselves,

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 57.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 83; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the people will come to simplicity of themselves.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 57.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 83; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the people will come to simplicity of themselves.

sense.def: become plain and simple

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 58.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 85; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: If the government is (dull:) incompetent,

sense.def: "a certain (NP)", the「不在其位，不謀其政。 "When one does not hold a certian position one does not make plans for the administration of that position."

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 58.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 85; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the people will be (pure:) simple;

sense.def: "a certain (NP)", the「不在其位，不謀其政。 "When one does not hold a certian position one does not make plans for the administration of that position."

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 58.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 85; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: if the government is (discerning:) clever,

sense.def: "a certain (NP)", the「不在其位，不謀其政。 "When one does not hold a certian position one does not make plans for the administration of that position."

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 58.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 85; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the people will have many defects;

sense.def: "a certain (NP)", the「不在其位，不謀其政。 "When one does not hold a certian position one does not make plans for the administration of that position."

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 58.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 85; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: misfortune is that one which happiness leans,

sense.def: blessings (from Heaven or the ancestors); good fortune sent from above; fortunate circumstances

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 58.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 85; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: misfortune is that one which happiness leans,

sense.def: good fortune and happiness (also in the form of wealth...); blessings

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 58.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 85; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: happiness is that under which misfortune lies.

sense.def: blessings (from Heaven or the ancestors); good fortune sent from above; fortunate circumstances

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 58.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 85; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: happiness is that under which misfortune lies.

sense.def: good fortune and happiness (also in the form of wealth...); blessings

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 59.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 87; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: means (LC 324)an early (working on:) application to (sc. the Tao)

sense.def: this aforementioned N; the preceding N (is the one the SUBJECT VERBS) 敗是求 "it is defeat that you have sought"

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 59.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 87; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: means (LC 324)an early (working on:) application to (sc. the Tao)

sense.def: in good time, at an early stage; at an earlier stage, at a sufficiently early stage

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 59.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 87; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: nobody knows the limit of it.

sense.def: no one

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 59.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 87; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: is the method for living long and to be seen for a long time.

sense.def: lifespan

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 60.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 87; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: To govern a great state is like cooking small fishes.

sense.def: small fish

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 60.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 87; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Since both parts [spirits and the Sage] do not together make any harm,

sense.def: the object(s), this, him; them; the other

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 62.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 91; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The Tao is the sanctuary of the myriad things,

sense.def: nominalising suffix after nominal elements, marking subjects that are topics at the same time 仁者 "as for goodness" (Note the occasional presence of demonstrative pronouns as in 彼聖人者)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 62.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 91; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: it is the treasure of the good man,

sense.def: most important thing, objectively most valuable thing 諸侯之寶三

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 62.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 91; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: it is that by which the bad man is (protected:) preserved.

sense.def: inferior, bad 不善人，不善之性

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 62.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 91; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The bad ones among men,

sense.def: relative clause marker equivalent to 而

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 63.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 93; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Sage still finds the easy difficult,

sense.def: regard something as difficult; find something dificult 難之

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 63.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 93; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: hence he never has any [real] difficulties.

sense.def: na4n: difficult point, difficulty; what is difficult; difficult task; difficulties ahead

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 64.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 93; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: What is quiet is easy to hold.

sense.def: "a certain (NP)", the「不在其位，不謀其政。 "When one does not hold a certian position one does not make plans for the administration of that position."

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 64.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 93; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: that of which there are still no symptoms is easily planned for.

sense.def: "a certain (NP)", the「不在其位，不謀其政。 "When one does not hold a certian position one does not make plans for the administration of that position."

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 64.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 93; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: What is brittle is easy to cleave.

sense.def: "a certain (NP)", the「不在其位，不謀其政。 "When one does not hold a certian position one does not make plans for the administration of that position."

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 64.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 93; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: What is minute is easily scattered.

sense.def: "a certain (NP)", the「不在其位，不謀其政。 "When one does not hold a certian position one does not make plans for the administration of that position."

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 64.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 93; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Be careful about the end just as about the beginning,

sense.def: the end; successful conclusion

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 64.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 93; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: and so he supports the natural stage of the myriad things,

sense.def: the natural tendencies of N; the natural properties of N

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 65.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 97; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: When the people is difficult to govern,

sense.def: be governed; be reduced to proper order

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 65.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 97; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The one who (knows:) understands these two [principles]

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 66.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 97; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: you must with your (body:) person follow after them.

sense.def: contrastive: one's own person; oneself; himself

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 69.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 101; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: I dare not be the host, but I [prefer] being the guest.

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 69.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 101; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: if I underrate the enemy it comes near to my losing my treasures.

sense.def: most important thing, objectively most valuable thing 諸侯之寶三

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 70.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 103; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: My words are very easy to (know:) understand,

sense.def: I, the writer of this text

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 70.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 103; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: but his jade jewel he hides in his bosom.

sense.def: N [[tls:syn-func::#uuid-76be1df4-3d73-4e5f-bbc2-729542645bc8][nab]] {[[tls:sem-feat::#uuid-62a630be-58ae-44f4-b858-a7540b2de8d3][moral]]} /

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 72.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 105; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: do not make them weary of their means of livelihood.

sense.def: get bored with; lose interest in

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 72.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 105; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: If they are not wearied,

sense.def: be bored or become bored with something contextually determinate

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 72.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 105; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Sage knows himself

sense.def: understand (oneself); know where one is;

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 72.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 105; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: but he does not show himself off,

sense.def: make a display of (oneself)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 72.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 105; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: he loves himself

sense.def: love (oneself)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 73.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 105; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The one who is bold in daring, becomes killed,

sense.def: courage

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 73.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 105; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The one who is bold in daring, becomes killed,

sense.def: get killed

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 73.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 105; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Of these two, the one is favourable, the other is harmful.

sense.def: 此三者

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 73.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 105; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Of these two, the one is favourable, the other is harmful.

sense.def: after number phrase 三家者， 之數物者

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 73.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 105; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Of these two, the one is favourable, the other is harmful.

sense.def: the one..., the other 二者，或有餘於數，或不足於數，

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 73.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 105; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: One whom Heaven hates,

sense.def: God of Heaven, personified Heaven (note personification in 天之愛民)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 75.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 109; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: That the people are difficult to govern

sense.def: be governed; be reduced to proper order

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 75.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 109; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: therefore they are difficult to govern.

sense.def: be governed; be reduced to proper order

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 76.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 109; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: at their birth are soft and brittle,

sense.def: wither away; become emaciated

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 77.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 111; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven's Way, is not like bending a bow,

sense.def: bend (a bow); string (a bow)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 77.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 111; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Who is it that can have a surplus and give to the world,

sense.def: who? (non-contrastive, i. e. not: "which of these listed possible subjects") but typically: what kind of person

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 78.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 113; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: That the weak overcomes the strong,

sense.def: the weak; a weak person; the weaker party

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 78.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 113; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: That the weak overcomes the strong,

sense.def: those who are strong and powerful; person who is strong; the stronger party

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 78.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 113; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the soft overcomes the hard,

sense.def: the soft and weak

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 78.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 113; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the soft overcomes the hard,

sense.def: that which is firm, the firm and strong things; a hard substance

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 78.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 113; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: may appear to be (reversed:) absurd.

sense.def: contrary to what is known> absurd

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 79.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 113; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the sage keeps the left half of the document of agreement

sense.def: tally of contract 左契

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: In a small state with few inhabitant

sense.def: make smaller; ensure the smallness of

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: In a small state with few inhabitant

sense.def: cause to be few

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: In a small state with few inhabitant

sense.def: amount of people; population; mankind

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: supposing that there exist men with the capacity of ten or a hundred men,

sense.def: cause somebody contextually determinate N to V, make somebody N get into a certain situation, make somebody or something obtain a quality

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: supposing that there exist men with the capacity of ten or a hundred men,

sense.def: a group of ten persons or items

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: supposing that there exist men with the capacity of ten or a hundred men,

sense.def: (amout of) ten; unit of ten

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: supposing that there exist men with the capacity of ten or a hundred men,

sense.def: one hundred

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: supposing that there exist men with the capacity of ten or a hundred men,

sense.def: force of a hundred, German: Hundertschaft

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: supposing that there exist men with the capacity of ten or a hundred men,

sense.def: weapons

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that the people had respect for death

sense.def: cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Supposing that the people had respect for death

sense.def: consider as important; consider as a serious matter, take seriously, attach importance to; be chiefly concerned with; 最重

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: and did not emigrate far away.

sense.def: in the far distance, far away; into the far distance; on a distant journey; over a long distance

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: and did not emigrate far away.

sense.def: move house; move place, move about, move around; change course; migrate; move abroad

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Even if there existed boats and carriages

sense.def: means of transport

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: even if there were buff-coats and weapons,

sense.def: armour and weapons; military equipment (not nececessarily only armour and weapons specifically, compare 仁義 "morality")

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: that they found their food savoury,

sense.def: Note that Lù Démíng reads this meaning as sì in several places of 經典釋文: provisions; food supply; staple food; food for general sustenance while at home; (e.g. beg for) something to eat; food supplies; fodder (e.g. for horses)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Neighbouring states would see one another,

sense.def: neighbouring; adjacent

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Neighbouring states would see one another,

sense.def: in mutual interaction> each other, mutually

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Neighbouring states would see one another,

sense.def: look out for; look at (admiringly) from afar; look to (for guidance); look into the distance (as from a tower etc); see from a distance; look around; look into distance in expectation of somebody's arrival

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the sound of cocks and dogs would be heard between them,

sense.def: cock

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the sound of cocks and dogs would be heard between them,

sense.def: cock; chicken

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the sound of cocks and dogs would be heard between them,

sense.def: dog

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the sound of cocks and dogs would be heard between them,

sense.def: generally: sound made by any creature

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the sound of cocks and dogs would be heard between them,

sense.def: hear (sounds); overhear; hear about

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the people would reach old age and die without any intercourse between them.

sense.def: arrive at, turn up at; get to (a place); abstract: advance to the position of; attain to

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the people would reach old age and die without any intercourse between them.

sense.def: old age; getting old

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the people would reach old age and die without any intercourse between them.

sense.def: death, also abstract: the fact of dying; mode of dying

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO 80.3; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 115; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the people would reach old age and die without any intercourse between them.

sense.def: have social intercourse with (one another); go back and forth between (places)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Sincere words are not beautiful

sense.def: trustworthy> reliably true

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Sincere words are not beautiful

sense.def: statements of opinion, proposal; public or formal utterance which commits the speaker; pronouncement; public or formal pronouncement, public or formal suggestion; Sometimes less specifically: proposal; what one says, speech; language; public proposal, public speech, words

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Sincere words are not beautiful

sense.def: be of non-material superior beauty

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: beautiful words are not sincere.

sense.def: attractive; welcome

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: beautiful words are not sincere.

sense.def: be reliably true, be trustworthy; be certainly the case

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The good man does not dispute,

sense.def: be impressive, be excellent; be the best; be good 甚善

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the disputing man is not good.

sense.def: be well-spoken, be eloquent, be rhetorically successful; be well-argued; show eloquence in action

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The one who knows is not widely learned,

sense.def: understand things properly; understand something indeterminate properly

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: The one who knows is not widely learned,

sense.def: be broad, be not narrow (of learning or knowledge), comprehensive, wide-ranging

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.1; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the widely learned does not know.

sense.def: be broad, be not narrow (of learning or knowledge), comprehensive, wide-ranging

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: 195. The sage does not hoard.

sense.def: the person of extraordinary and creative talent (with untensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: 195. The sage does not hoard.

sense.def: engage in the accumulation of things

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Having already worked on behalf of others he himself is increasingly enriched;

sense.def: having already

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Having already worked on behalf of others he himself is increasingly enriched;

sense.def: work for; be on the side of; work for the benefit of; work towards; aim for; act in the spirit of 為公甚

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Having already worked on behalf of others he himself is increasingly enriched;

sense.def: oneself (emphatic, contrasting with others)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: Having already worked on behalf of others he himself is increasingly enriched;

sense.def: ever more; SHI: increasingly; more and more; all the more, even more; ZZ: the more... the more

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: having already given away to others he himself is increasingly in abundance.

sense.def: oneself (emphatic, contrasting with others)

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: having already given away to others he himself is increasingly in abundance.

sense.def: ever more; SHI: increasingly; more and more; all the more, even more; ZZ: the more... the more

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: 196. The Way of Heaven is to benefit people and not to harm them;

sense.def: Nature; what is natural; natural endowment, natural features

tls:text.tls:srcline:
聖人之道、
為而弗爭。

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the Way of the Sage is to engage in action and not to be contentious.

sense.def: the person of extraordinary and creative talent (with untensed predicate)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
聖人之道、
為而弗爭。

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the Way of the Sage is to engage in action and not to be contentious.

sense.def: engage in action, do what one does

tls:text.tls:srcline:
聖人之道、
為而弗爭。

tls:line.title: 老子(en)
tls:line.loc: LAO i1.2; tr. D.C. Lau 19i2: 117; here tr. Karlgren 1975

tls:text.tls:line: the Way of the Sage is to engage in action and not to be contentious.

sense.def: engage in competition and conflict; be competitive
